sub_header: <0>I'm a junior Web Developer, focused on <1>JavaScript</1> and <1>PHP</1> development.<2></2>I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from design to React, Node.js and Symfony.</0>

projectItems.title: Personal Website
projectItems.description: <0>This personal website is a project in continuous development. I try to improve my code quality and efficiency at each iteration. This porfolio is build as a React app with the framework <2>Next.js</2>.<1></1>I am using <2>Tailwind</2> CSS framework for styling. The translations are handled by <2>i18n</2> library.<1></1>The blog's content is handled with <2>MDX</2> files compiled and rendered as React components.<1></1>You will find here some of the latest projects I have been working on.</0>

projectItems.title: Aest game
projectItems.description: <0>Aest is a game attempting to reproduce a training tool for visual assessment of crop diseases.<1></1>The project was build with PHP <2>Symfony</2> framework.<1></1>Users and game stats are handled server-side while the game mechanic is handled client-side with JavaScript and jQuery library.<1></1>Game stats are stored on a <2>mySQL</2> database. <2>Tailwind</2> CSS framework is used for the app styling</0>

projectItems.title: Phonebook React App
projectItems.description: <0>This phonebook app was created with React. Phonebook data is stored on <2>MongoDB</2>. A server set up with Node.js - <2>Express</2> framework is handling network requests. The app is styled using <2>'styled components'</2> library.</0>

projectItems.title: Intro Component with sign-up form
projectItems.description: <0>This sign-up page was build with plain HTML and CSS. The page is responsive. Client-side form validation is implemented in JavaScript. JavaScript is also used to alert user on valid/non-valid sign-up fields upon form submission.</0>
